text: Wing ke bade bhaiya! Tune 4 saale me kitna juice (and stuff :P) pilaya hoga uska hissab nhi. Sabke saath equally milke maze karna koi terese seekhe (mai to nhi seekh paya lol). Tujhe car se jaate dekhke tab hi decide kiya tha ki fir to milna hi hai, so jald hi aa rhe hum sab tere haweli par!
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: Tujhe yaad h hum eksaath robotics ka workshop kiye the 1st year me?? Tab thodi pata tha ki tum itna chill-n-chaapu insaan ho ;P! Aise hi haste rehna and chill marte rehna.
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: You are one of the only 2 guys I know jinko dekhke laga tha,"Log itne saare cheezo me itna kaise chaap sakhte h!" And u know who the other person is :P. I know mujhe bolne ki zaroorat nhi h, but sports mat chhodna bhai. 2-4 match aur goalkeeping ya defending karna tha yaar tere against.
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: Alii bhaaai! TKD days se hi sab cheez me tera itna enthusiasm dekhke mai kaafi inspire hua hu. Campus me mera only foreigner dost (XD)! All the best bro.
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: Mai to 4 saal tak ek Aman ko pehchanta tha, fir usdin A block ki chhat par koi dusra hi Aman dikha diya yaar tune!!! Dono side zinda rehna chahiye bhai. Milte h (hopefully US me :D).
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: Kitne plans banaye the ki dono tae kwon do continue karenge, belt laynge...sab paani me XD. Apna cool n calm wala vibe maintain karna, and arts continue karna. Hare Krishna!

text: Abe tera gmail id dynamiterdx nhi hai????? Kyuuu bhaii(lol)? Hopefully hum bhi kabhi tumhare jaisa smexy ban jai. Milte h agli saal, aur lucknow bula mujhe, bhai ko kabab khaana h!!!
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text:
Meri galti ki wajah se nhi mil pai yaar :(, aur saale, mssge nhi dekha to call to kar leta!! Koi nhi, bangalore me pakka milte h, tab tak naruto waale posts par mention karte rehna :). 
Aur haan, tu bada achcha insaan h, tujhse baat karke bada acha lagta h blah blah blah... baki log likh hi rhe hoge yesab, to mai rehn deta hu :P.

text:
Mai tujhe Naruto ka Hinata samajhta tha, phir volleyball court jaake pata chala who's the boss! Tera seedha attitude bohot yaad ayga, and tera "Deb yaaar..." bhi. 
Aur saale khali khali chakna lene aa mat jana firse mc!! ):-(
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: Maine apna "are yaaaar!" terese hi copy kiya h. Too bad tumne phy chhodke maths le liya(waise mai kaun hota hu bone wala XD). Kabhi milte h to apni apni jhand life k baare me discuss karenge fir se. Cheers!
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: Last k kuchh din aapke room me jo memories bane, wo zindagi bhar yaad rahega. Thanks humari harkate sehne k liye. Chahe kitne bade corporate post me chale jao, mai to humesha bhaiya hi bulaunga aapko, gussa mat hona!
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: Tera pehla dialogue yaad h mujhe,"Are padhai ko leke itna tension mat le, araamse satti atthi laake humare dept(Aero) me aa ja", fir tum khud CSE me chale gye!!! Always appreciated your advices and opinions. Good luck.
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text:
Orientation ka adha maza tere sath gappe marke hi ay the, kya time tha wo bhi! Aisa bohot baar hua ki tension me hu, but raaste me tera smile dekhke laga, "are chill h yaar"... always keep smiling bhai.

P.S. Kya bol rhe the? Orientation k time kuchh kar lena chahiye tha? ;P, kar lo bro, its never too late.
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: "Itna chaapu yet itna humble!" that was kind of my first impression of you. Its weird ki hum mostly batti k context me hi mile h, from electrowiz to batti lab, but it was really fun doing those with you. All the best future k liye.
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: Abhi kal hi ki to baat h, fresher's inferno me powerlifting kar rhe the XD! Uss time hi pata chal gya tha kitna chill and jolly insaan h tu. Chaapte rehna zindagi me.
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: Aur fraudie!!!
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text:
Saala last mahine me mujhe pata chala ki maine tereko thik se pehchana hi nhi tha 4 saal me :(, warna kaafi aur maze kar lete. Tere room pe wo sandwich banane wala din kabhi nhi bhulunga. Jaate waqt iss rondu bachche ko kaafi samhala tune, uske liye bhi thanks<3. Baaki bongfobia thoda kam kar bhai, yaha bhi acche insaan hai, sacchiii!
Chal teri honor me ekbar bol hi deta hu....Jai Shree Raam!!
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: Na wo trek kabhi bhulunga, na hi tujhe. Tshoka waale room pe, adha sleeping bag me ghuske kaapte huye gappe maarne me kya mast maza aa rha tha yaar! Trek se pehle milte to aur maze karte, and trek baad to mkb ho gya zindagi ka :) :).
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: Tumne machhhli nhi khilaya :(, lekin DS k assignment k baad canteen me chicken kassa zarur khilaya tha. Batti camp k time tere room pe raat raat tak jo bakchodi karte the, wo sochke alag feel aati h yaar. Aur tum to mere coding guru ho, aur fine arts guru bhi kind of :P. Animation and fine arts karte rehna bhai (maine insta dwnld kar liya wapas, abhi dekho tumhare posts me kaise love react pe love react deta hu!!).
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text:
Too bad ki hum kaafi late mile...wo bhi online. Kaafi maze karna reh gya. And thanks for the name <3.

-AIDS
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text:
Tere liye to man me bohot baatein h yaar, point karke likhta hu ruk...
College me gaaliyon ki ABCD maine tumse hi seekha h, isliye pranam guruji!
Tere saath football aur volleyball khelna kaafi miss karunga, but saale kabhi post pe bhi shoot mar diya kar, warna 2km jaake hume ball laani padhti thi!
Tera inborn talent h bhai TA me, isliye autocad kabhi uninstall mat karna dabbe se :P.
Aur tumhe to pata hi h tumhare supervision k beena peeke kya haal hua ussdin mera XD! To aaunga kabhi training continue karne. Cheers!
Baaki tu humesha bhai rahega mera <3.
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: Apna milne par "Modi!", "Sarkar!" ye famous hona chahiye tha yaar :(
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: Bhai apan dono me kaafi similarities h, in the sense ki apan dono ne internship ko thoda zyada hi seriously le liya tha XD XD! Tera chill side se milne ka mauka nhi mila zyada, iska dukh h. Good luck in life brother.
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: "Apan double major waalon ka kya hoga yaar!" XD...Tu bhi mere jaisa bohot ghuma h interst dhundne k chakkar me, but tera confidence aur resourcefulness dekhke motivation milta tha humesha. Chaapne to tum waale hi ho aage, pakka vishwas h mujhe. Thoda bhai ko bhi "behind the scenes" khabare dete rehna acads ka.
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text:
Tere saath kucch chal rha ho to uska pehla update mereko hi aata tha, you know why :P. Kabhi kabhi tum logo ko bhaga diya karta tha, ab regret hota h uske liye. Bohot saara football reh gya, bohot saara gym karna reh gya, bohot saare discussions reh gye:(.
I am lucky to have a friend like you (ye sentence bada ajeeb lagta h sunne me). Kabhi sab milke banate h "Deb ka room" wala maahaul.
And tujhe to pata hi h, tere plans k liye full support bhai ka!
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text:
Yaar tera and srajit ka memoir kaafi same ho jayga…hona hi h :D!!!

Yaar tum logo se gaali khaane me alag hi maza aata tha! Gaali de de ke Introvert Deb ko thoda bakchodi karna sikhaya, iske liye to bohot saara thanks.
Bakchodi waali baate to thik h, but har sem tere saath koi na koi course kiya hi h na! mth, fir esc, phir mso, fir DS…yaar inke memories bhi kitne mast h. Saale har week aake tu merese zabardasti esc201 assignment karwata tha, bohot gussa aata tha tab XD. And intern prep bhi kitna mast time tha(wo alag baat ki aap saanp banke hum bhaiyo ko chhodke day1 laga liye….dost ki intern na lage to dukh hota hai, but dost day1 laga le to aur dukh hota h :(.   )
IITK me apna last scene to yaar….kya hi batau, mujhe kabhi laga nhi tha ki waisa hoga.
Memories to bohot huye…ek line tumhare liye bhi likhte h….
Tere jaisa confident, decisive, both chill and serious, thoda mc but overall bohot acha insaan aur nhi hoga. Love you man!
Aur saale parental supervision(matlab mera and Srajit ka) k alawa peena mat….bank account khali ho jayga XD.
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text:
"Tu kanpur ka h! shahar ghumake dikhana apna", tab tujhe dekhke hi pata chal gya tha ye banda maze karne wala h. 4 saal tak bete aur damaad ka khayal rakhne ka shukriya. Tu jo ek point leke tika rehta tha, jab tak wo sab maan na le(jaise ujjwal ko beta bolna XD), ye mujhe fascinating lagta tha. Mere jaise maggu ko room se bahar nikaalne me tera bhi bohot haat h. Tere photos and screenshots ki list se abhi bhi dar lagta h mujhe (bhai wo sab delete kar dena yaar!).  Aur last month ki baat to kya hi batay, wo yaadein man me hi rehne dete h.
Hopefully wapas milenge bhai IITK me. 
Aur haan, agar mai bagnladeshi hu tu to bhi pakistani hai bsdk, mujhe nhi pata kaise, bas tu hai!!!
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: Apna sabse zyada interaction last mahine hi hua...magar apne volleyball team ka tu essential part tha humesha. Aur apna 'emotional connection' to hai hi strong :D, yaad h na kyu?
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text:
Tere saath zyada memories hai nhi yaar....ab tu force kar rha h to likh deta hu memoir.
Tere saath saare courses ko leke RR karke bilkul maza nhi aata tha... Na hi ek dusre ko lagataar "mai to ch**iya hu, tu bakchod insaan h yaar" bolne me.
Mujhe football se introduce karane me tera zero contribution tha, and mai iske liye thankful bhi nhi hu. Maza bhi nhi aata tha terese saath football khelne me.
Thank god tune physics chhod diya, bohot khush hua tha mai...lekin haan, mai ye bhi nahi chahta ki tu Quantum computing me bakchod researcher ban jay.
Jab tu bolta tha "Isme B h yaar, isme C h yaaaar", tab man hi man pata hota tha ki tu bohot bada satyavadi h. Fir A* laane k baad gaaliyan dene me bhi maza nhi aata tha.
Apne wing me tera room mai secure nhi kar paya is baat ki khusi mai abhi bhi nhi bhul pata. Iske liye maafi bhi nhi maang rha mai.
Mai bilkul nhi chahta tha ki tu humare saath ekbar piye, so wo hua nhi to mujhe bohot khusi h.
Mil gya memoir! Ab khush??

Bhai decrypt kar lena, :D(assuming to beechme hi gussa hoke padhna na chhod diya ho lol)...
bohot miss karunga tujhe yaar, iss baare me no mazak. Pakka try karunga Allahabad aake terese milne ki.
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: It was annoying at that time, but now I miss your "....o amake A debe na, ami B pabo" etc XD. Emon e open thakis, chaapu thakis. Kolkata ele arekta 'okhil bongo treat' kora jabe.
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: Campus a Shesh dekha holo na mama :(. Would've loved to do RR in a few more courses with you. Sei HSS a banglar upobhasha bola diye suru, and the rest of story is just too much fun to describe. All the best bro, industry ja, academics a ja, nepal e ja, gaddai ja...jekhane khusi ja, asha kori khusi thakbi. Ar kolkata ele pork(and preferably kono torol, hehe) khawabi sala.
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: Bhai galaxy fine arts!!! Kya time tha yaar!
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: industry goli maaro yaar... QIC tumhara passion h, wo follow karo. Phy ka course offline hota to tumhare saath karke aur maza aata.
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text:
Thank god mai wo winter camp ruk gya tha, warna kya pata cheeze alag hote.
Jab bhi raat me canteen jaane waali yaadein aate hai, lgta h kya time tha wo yaar!(Tum snek beechme jaana chhod diye the, tumhe bc fit banna tha lol! Aur fir 30 minute baad aake mujhe wapas kheechke leke jaate the.) 
Tere chakkar me dance tak seekh liya bhai, 1st year ka Deb to ye soch bhi nhi sakhta tha XD!!!
Mere room ko 'ghar' banaya tum logone(ye line bohot pehle soch rakha tha maine XD). Kabhi Bangalore aata hu, banate hai ek "Deb ka room" wala mahaul.

Itna innovative prankster, itna chilll maarne wala banda, itna 'easy af' solutions nikaalne wala…bhai tune mujhe kitna inspire and motivate kiya h tujhe nhi pata. Papa is proud :)!

P.S: Aur tum drawing chaalu rakho….ek baar bakchod ban jao basss, fir dekho sab tapatap patne lagengi!
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text: Mujhe laga tha 'that's what she said' tera hi banaya term h lol, itna zyada use karta tha, lekin itna exact! And tere baaki NSFW jokes bhi bohot enjoy karta tha. Aur saale koi bhi subject me doubt ho mere paas aa jata tha, chahe wo course kiya ho maine ya nhi...itna bharosa bhai par!! Chaapte raho life me, jaise humesha se chaapte aye ho, best of luck!
author: Debmalya  Sarkar

text:
"Maine zindagi me bhi nhi socha tha ki wingwaalon k saath piyunga"...mai bhi bhai. Tum payr me moch lagake bayth gye, warna aur bhi khel lete football. Hopefully mil rhe IITK me jald hi. 
(Merese batti k tips etc mat puchna bhai, tujhe to pata hi hai mai kitna passionate hu batti leke XD)
author: Debmalya  Sarkar
